mapper.select: SELECT reservation_cd as reservationCd ,lesson_cd as lessonCd ,reservation_id as reservationId ,reservation_date as reservationDate ,reservation_start_time as reservationStartTime ,reservation_end_time as reservationEndTime ,reservation_cancel as reservationCancel FROM lesson_reservation WHERE reservation_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}

SELECT lesson_sub.town_cd ,lesson_sub.town_nm ,lesson_sub.area_cd ,lesson_sub.facility_cd ,lesson_sub.main_ctg_cd ,lesson_sub.facility_use_cd ,lesson_sub.sports_cd ,lesson_sub.user_id ,lesson_sub.facility_nm ,lesson_sub.facility_address ,lesson_sub.facility_tell ,lesson_sub.business_number ,lesson_sub.facility_reg_date ,lesson_sub.facility_post_num ,lesson_sub.facility_detail_addr ,lesson_sub.area_cd ,lesson_sub.lesson_cd ,lesson_sub.goods_ctg_cd ,lesson_sub.sports_cd ,lesson_sub.lesson_division ,lesson_sub.sports_nm ,lesson_sub.lesson_nm ,lesson_sub.lesson_detail ,lesson_sub.lesson_total_member ,lesson_sub.lesson_member ,lesson_sub.lesson_start_date ,lesson_sub.lesson_end_date ,lesson_sub.lesson_start_time ,lesson_sub.lesson_end_time ,lesson_sub.lesson_count ,lesson_sub.lesson_price ,lesson_sub.facility_goods_cd ,lesson_sub.lesson_reg_date ,lesson_file.file_cd ,lesson_file.original_file_nm ,lesson_file.stored_file_path ,lesson_file.file_size ,lesson_file.re_file_name ,lesson_file.uploader_id ,lesson_file.upload_date ,lesson_file.updated_datetime ,lesson_file.represent_img FROM (SELECT act.town_cd ,act.town_nm ,f.facility_cd ,f.main_ctg_cd ,f.facility_use_cd ,f.facility_nm ,f.facility_address ,f.facility_tell ,f.business_number ,f.facility_reg_date ,f.facility_post_num ,f.facility_detail_addr ,f.area_cd ,l.lesson_cd ,l.sports_cd ,l.lesson_division ,l.goods_ctg_cd ,l.user_id ,l.sports_nm ,l.lesson_nm ,l.lesson_detail ,l.lesson_total_member ,l.lesson_member ,l.lesson_start_date ,l.lesson_end_date ,l.lesson_start_time ,l.lesson_end_time ,l.lesson_count ,l.lesson_price ,l.facility_goods_cd ,l.lesson_reg_date FROM lesson AS l INNER JOIN facility AS f ON l.facility_cd = f.facility_cd INNER JOIN area_city_town AS act on f.town_cd = act.town_cd WHERE l.lesson_cd = #{lessonCd}) AS lesson_sub LEFT JOIN (SELECT rfwg.facility_goods_cd ,tf.file_cd ,tf.re_file_name ,tf.original_file_nm ,tf.stored_file_path ,tf.file_size ,tf.uploader_id ,tf.upload_date ,tf.updator_id ,tf.updated_datetime ,tf.represent_img FROM rel_file_with_goods AS rfwg INNER JOIN t_file AS tf on tf.file_cd = rfwg.flie_cd WHERE tf.deleted_yn != 'Y') AS lesson_file on lesson_file.facility_goods_cd = lesson_sub.facility_goods_cd

SELECT l.lesson_cd ,l.lesson_division ,l.facility_goods_cd ,l.facility_cd ,l.goods_ctg_cd ,l.sports_cd ,l.user_id ,l.lesson_nm ,l.lesson_detail ,l.lesson_total_member ,l.lesson_price ,l.lesson_member ,l.lesson_start_date ,l.lesson_end_date ,l.lesson_start_time ,l.lesson_end_time ,l.lesson_count ,l.lesson_state ,l.lesson_reg_date ,s.sports_nm ,s.sports_cd FROM lesson AS l INNER JOIN sports AS s on l.sports_cd = s.sports_cd WHERE l.facility_cd = #{facilityCd}
